udaba: Noma yini ethatha isikhala futhi inesisindo
isici: Into ehlanzekile eyenziwe ngohlobo olulodwa kuphela lwe-athomu
i-athomu: Iyunithi encane yodaba engabamba iqhaza ekuphenduleni kwamakhemikhali
inhlanganisela: Into eyenziwe ngezinto ezimbili noma ngaphezulu eziboshwe ngamakhemikhali
ingxube: Inhlanganisela yezinto ezimbili noma ngaphezulu ezingahlangene ngamakhemikhali
okufanayo: Ingxube enokwakheka okufanayo kuyo yonke indawo (isb., isixazululo)
isimo: Indlela udaba olukhona ngayo (okuqinile, uketshezi, igesi, i-plasma)
uketshezi: Isimo sendaba esinomthamo oqondile kodwa ongekho umumo oqondile
igesi: Isimo sodaba esingenawo umumo noma umthamo oqondile
ukusabela: Inqubo lapho izinto zishintsha khona ukuze zakhe izinto ezintsha
isibopho: Phoqa ukubamba ama-athomu ndawonye ku-molecule noma inhlanganisela
ifomula yamakhemikhali: Indlela emfishane yokumela into esebenzisa izimpawu nezinombolo
isisombululo: Ingxube ye-homogeneous ye-solute (into encibilikisiwe) kanye ne-solvent (into encibilikayo)
ukugxilisa ingqondo: Inani le-solute encibilikisiwe enanini elinikeziwe le-solvent
ukungathathi hlangothi: Ukusabela phakathi kwe-asidi nesisekelo, kwakha usawoti namanzi
amandla amakhemikhali: Amandla angaba khona agcinwe kumabhondi amakhemikhali ento
